TSB_DEVELOPMENT_SESSION_COOKIE_KEY: secret key as per your wish
TSB_DEVELOPMENT_DB: database URI as per your wish
TSB_DEVELOPMENT_DB_NAME: database name as per your wish
TSB_DEVELOPMENT_USER_EMAIL: user email which sends the email, as per your wish
TSB_DEVELOPMENT_USER_PASS: app password of the above account. 2FA should be ON. app password can be set in the security settings of the account
TSB_DEVELOPMENT_JWT_SECRET: secret key as per your wish

TSB_DEVELOPMENT_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY: configured google embed maps api key. it's free.
